snippet: Diplomats and policy experts say that a pact must convince companies and investors that traditional fossil fuels are less profitable.
abstract: Success of Paris climate agreement largely depends on whether it influences global finance industry to move investments from fossil fuels to renewable energy; current draft of deal remains vague on how to ensure countries are keeping their commitments, provision investors waiting to make switch to sustainable energy require.
lead_paragraph: Diplomats and policy experts say that a pact must convince companies and investors that traditional fossil fuels are less profitable.

headline.main: Key to Success of Climate Pact Will Be Its Signals to Global Markets
headline.print_headline: Key to Success of Climate Pact Will Be Its Signals to Global Markets

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
